sentences.en: All of these may momentarily depress profits or market value.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都有可能暂时造成利润或者市场价值的减少.

sentences.en: As a matter of fact, that will depress it's elegance.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 这样相反会使它的高雅降色.

sentences.en: Before initial dose, depress pump 4 - 5 times or until primed.
sentences.cn: 首次使用本产品前,请按压喷头 4-5 次,直到可以喷出本产品.

sentences.en: Both the monomer and the polymer network will depress phase transition temperatures.
sentences.cn: 不同的液晶态可通过控制铁电液晶的温度来获得.

sentences.en: Cannot the person of hematic depress drink chrysanthemum tea?
sentences.cn: 血压低的人不能喝菊花茶 吗 ?

sentences.en: Depress the clutch fully.
sentences.cn: 把离合器踩到底。

sentences.en: High interest rates may depress share prices.
sentences.cn: 高利率可能打压股价。

sentences.en: I know he is too optimistic but I don't want to depress him.
sentences.cn: 我知道他太过乐观了，但我不想令他灰心丧气。

sentences.en: I'd only depress you, reminding you of your lost love.
sentences.cn: 我只会惹得你伤心, 教你想起你失去的心上人.

sentences.en: It depresses me that nobody seems to care.
sentences.cn: 似乎没有人在乎，这让我感到很沮丧。

sentences.en: No such immaterial burden could depress that buoyant - hearted young gentleman for many hours together.
sentences.cn: 这种无形的负担,从来不会使这位逍遥自在的大少爷吃不下饭,睡不着觉.

sentences.en: Several factors combined to depress the American economy.
sentences.cn: 几个因素加在一起造成了美国经济的不景气。

sentences.en: Small doses depress salivary and bronchial secretion and sweating.
sentences.cn: 小剂量可抑制唾液分泌、支气管分泌及出汗.

sentences.en: Some medicines depress the action of the heart.
sentences.cn: 有些药物会减弱心脏的功能.

sentences.en: That'll depress the market tomorrow morning, and then we'll begin covering in separate lots - "
sentences.cn: 混过了明天上午, 明天早市我们分批补进 —— ”

sentences.en: The rainy days always depress me.
sentences.cn: 雨天总是使我沮丧.

sentences.en: The result has been to encourage domestic production and depress domestic consumption, especially in Europe.
sentences.cn: 结果是鼓励了国内生产,压缩了国内消费, 在欧洲尤是如此.

sentences.en: The spiral in confidence is likely to depress growth even further.
sentences.cn: 市场信心的下滑可能会进一步拖累经济增长.

sentences.en: The thought of taking the exam again depressed him.
sentences.cn: 想到要补考，他就心情沮丧。

sentences.en: Unhappiness does not only depress your mood, also negatively affects your health.
sentences.cn: 忧虑不仅让你心情沮丧, 也损害你的健康.

words.tran_cn: 抑压者；抑压物；压板；降肌
使沮丧；使萧条（depress的过去式和过去分词形式）；压低

trans.tran_cn: 使抑郁，使萧条，按下，减少
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel very unhappy

trans.tran_cn: 使沮丧， 使消沉； 使不景气， 削弱； 按下， 压下； 使贬值
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel very unhappy
